data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
In the minute 2, Throw-in Cerezo.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Sendai.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Cerezo's Hiroaki Okuno misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Sendai have a goal kick.
Bruno Pereira Mendes of Cerezo is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 11, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sendai.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Cerezo.
In the minute 13, Sendai takes a corner from the right.
Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cerezo are whistled for offside.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Cerezo at Yurtec Stadium.
Kunimitsu Sekiguchi (Sendai) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 26, Sendai takes a corner from the right.
Sendai's Yasuhiro Hiraoka attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sendai.
In the minute 29, Throw-in high up the field for Cerezo in Sendai.
Cerezo are pushing forward but Hiroaki Okuno's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 33, Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Sendai have a dangerous throw-in.
Cerezo needs to be cautious. Sendai have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 34, Sendai drives forward and Kunimitsu Sekiguchi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sendai have a goal kick.
Cerezo drive forward but Hiroaki Okuno is judged offside.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Cerezo in their own half.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Throw-in for Cerezo at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 43, Cerezo are coming forward and Yoichiro Kakitani gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
Cerezo move into a 0-1 lead through a Bruno Pereira Mendes header.
In the minute 44, Yoichiro Kakitani instrumental with a fine assist.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
Can Sendai capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cerezo's half?
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Cerezo.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
Throw-in Sendai.
Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 50, Cerezo's Bruno Pereira Mendes is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick in a good position for Cerezo!
Matej Jonjic (Cerezo) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 52, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sendai.
Cerezo takes a corner from the left.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
In the minute 54, Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Takuma Nishimura is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 57, That's a fine assist from Para.
Cerezo are coming forward and Tatsuhiro Sakamoto gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 61, Free kick Sendai.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
Cerezo pushes forward through Ayumu Seko, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 67, Sendai have been given a penalty...
Takuma Nishimura converts the penalty to give Sendai a 2-1 lead.
The away team replace Yoichiro Kakitani with Hiroshi Kiyotake.
In the minute 68, Yuta Toyokawa is on a sub for Hiroaki Okuno for Cerezo.
In Sendai a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Cerezo's Tatsuhiro Sakamoto misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 71, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sendai.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Shun Nagasawa is on a sub for Alexandre Guedes for Sendai.
Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cerezo pushes forward through Yasuki Kimoto, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Throw-in for Cerezo close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Cerezo make their first substitution with Yuta Koike replacing Riku Matsuda.
In the minute 79, Naoyuki Fujita is replacing Yasuki Kimoto for the away team.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
In the minute 82, Goal! The away team draw level at 2-2 through a header from Matej Jonjic.
Hiroshi Kiyotake with an assist there.
Cerezo takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 86, Sendai make their second substitution with Takumi Mase replacing Kunimitsu Sekiguchi.
Shingo Hyodo is replacing Keiya Shiihashi for the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sendai.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The home team replace Para with Takayoshi Ishihara.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Cerezo takes a corner from the left.
Throw-in for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-3.
Goal! Hiroshi Kiyotake gives Cerezo a 2-3 lead.
Shota Fujio is replacing Bruno Pereira Mendes for the away team.
